#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int n;
	float a,f;
	cin>>n;
	char ar[n];
	cin>>ar;
	int i=0;
	cin>>a>>f;
	float count=0;
	while(i!=n)
	{
		if(ar[i]=='L')
			count +=a;
		else if(ar[i]=='R')
			count-=a;
		i++;
	}
	if(abs(count)<f)
		cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	else
		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	return 0;
}
